name: Bad Nerd vs Zombies
description:
"Fantastic ZOMBIE THEMED ACTION RPG!" - AppEggs.com

"Most Anticipated Back-To-School Sequel of 2012!" - Vio Laff

See a nerd put down zombies like never before!

If you are a fan of zombies and modern action RPGs with lots of zombies and fighting then you will love Nerd vs Zombies!

In the last episode Bad Nerd beat down all the school bullies and saved the school. But the trouble in the school is not over yet! Zombies have infested the school and Bad Nerd needs your help to terminate all the disgusting zombies so he can get back to studying for good grades!

* Multiplayer online mode for those who want to fight online unleashing their nerd rage on real people. Look for a new "Online Arena" door in the Main Hall!



Current Features:

- Exciting and modern settings
- Over 150 missions
- Loads of items such as weapons, armor, gadgets, etc..
- Simple inventory and shop system
- Over 30 bully beating moves
- Simple control system
- Visually stimulating characters that you'd want to beat up
- Multiplayer Online Arena
- Continuously growing game, much more updates coming
